item.title: Hugo: Making a portfolio site
item.description: Why Hugo? If you choose to build your portfolio site using only HTML and CSS, you may run into the issue of repetitive code. Example: Let’s say you have a blog post called my-blog-post.html and you want to create another post. What do you do? You could duplicate the file and rewrite the content, but what if you change the layout of the post? You have to make the change in every file!
